https://github.com/smarek/httpclient-android

HttpClient Android repackage buildscript

Build script and dependencies to 
create repackaged upstream version of HttpClient and depdendencies 
(HttpMime, HttpCore, HttpClient-Cache) and 
get it working on Android API version from 3 to 23

Current version: 4.4.1.1 (originating from upstream HttpClient 4.4.1 version)
